department.ch: 能源工程研究所碩士班

goal.en: Invited Speeches by experts and scholars from multi-disciplinary areas. The objectives of this course is to share present state-of-the-art technologies and to exchange experience of technology development, in order to broaden students‘ professional horizons and research scopes, and help students find suitable future research direction.
goal.ch: 邀請各領域之專家學者蒞臨演講，分享當今技術發展現況及經驗交流，以提升學生專業領域視野與研究廣度，並尋找適性發展的研究方向。

content.en: Invited Speech from multi-disciplinary areas, discussion and interaction between speakers and students.
content.ch: 邀請專家學者演講 ，並讓學生與專家學者進行討論與交流

grading.en: attendance, interaction with speakers, and reflection reports
grading.ch: 出席、現場互動、心得報告

flex_desc.en:
17th week : completion of the seminar reflection for all speeches.
18th week (final exam week) : self-directed learning
flex_desc.ch:
第17週：學生完成全學期上課心得報告撰寫 
第18週(期末考週)：自主學習

en.competency: Design / Development of Solution and Investigation

en: Department:MSc in Energy Engineering only.Year:First Year only.identity:Non-International Students Only.
ch: 系所:限能源工程研究所碩士班。年級:限一年級。身份:限非外籍生。
系所:限能源工程研究所碩士班。
